glsa.title: ICU: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ICU, the worst of which could cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: ICU is a mature, widely used set of C/C++ and Java libraries providing Unicode and Globalization support for software applications.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in ICU. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: Remote attackers could cause a Denial of Service condition or possibly have other unspecified impacts via a long locale string or httpAcceptLanguage argument. Additionally, A remote attacker, via a specially crafted file, could cause an application using ICU to parse untrusted font files resulting in a Denial of Service condition. Finally, remote attackers could affect confidentiality via unknown vectors related to 2D.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
